precaution: Clear your surroundings to make sure you do not knock over any items.
instruction: Grab the green cube with your right hand.
Lift the green cube up to your shoulder by bending your right elbow.
Lower the green cube back down by straightening your elbow as much as you can.
Grab the orange cube with your right hand.
Lift the orange cube up to your right shoulder by bending your right elbow.
Lower the orange cube back down towards the table by straightening your right elbow.
Release the orange cube. Grab the blue cube with your right hand.
Lift the blue cube up to shoulder height by bending your right elbow.
Lower the blue cube back towards the table by straightening your right elbow.
